$$y_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x_i + u_i$$

```{r}

set.seed(731)

beta0 <- 5
beta1 <- 2
error <- rnorm(100, 0, 1)

df <- 
  tibble(
    id = 1:100,
    x = runif(100, 0, 10),
    y = beta0 + beta1 * x + error
  )

```

```{r}

df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

```
